title: Radare2 project opening
content:
When I open a project r2 -p mypoject I get a bunch of errors with some numbers: 

0
0
Cannot add reference to non-function
Cannot add reference to non-function
1482

I use latest version of radare2 from git repository on Arch Linux. This is list of steps to reproduce this bug. 

r2 /bin/ls
> aaa
> Ps myproject
> q
r2 -p myproject

comments.text: I have the same. You should file na issue here: github.com/radare/radare2/issues
I opened an issue. Here it is if you're intrested: github.com/radare/radare2/issues/8582
